name: The Adventures of Emoji 4: Fly High Mouse
storyline: The Adventures of Emoji 4 combines the classic side scroller shooter with strategy and humor. Follow dynamic rules and use special weapons to defeat enemies for each level. Immerse yourself in a cartoon world of a mouse playing video games. Stay focused on the prize or you might find your game completely cut off.
summary: An action adventure shoot em up side-scroller game. Engage in battle with strange enemies and bosses. Funny hand drawn scenes and game mechanics. Music that captures the mood of each level.
